DOC.HEADLINE: WEEKEND TV ; FAMILY CHANNEL REVIVES ' HOLOCAUST '
DOC.TEXT: In observance of Holocaust Remembrance Week , the Family Channel revives the 1978 miniseries " Holocaust , " starring James Woods , Meryl Streep and Michael Moriarty . The five-part drama won eight Emmy Awards . It begins Sunday at 8 p.m. and continues nightly through Thursday . N.F. MENDOZA
